host.description: Domain name/IP of the Hue Bridge

model_id.description: The hardware model of the light.

name.description: A unique, editable name given to the light.

product_id.description: The Product ID of the Light

sw_version.description: An identifier for the software version running on the light.

unique_id.description: Unique id of the device. The MAC address of the device with a unique endpoint id in the form: AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF:00:11-XX

brightness.description: The brightness value to set the light to. Brightness is a scale from 1 (the minimum the light is capable of) to 254 (the maximum).

color_mode.description: Indicates the color mode in which the light is working, this is the last command type it received. Values are “hs” for Hue and Saturation, “xy” for XY and “ct” for Color Temperature. This parameter is only present when the light supports at least one of the values

hue.description: The hue value to set light to.The hue value is a wrapping value between 0 and 65535. Both 0 and 65535 are red, 25500 is green and 46920 is blue.

on.description: On/Off state of the light. On=true, Off=false

saturation.description: Saturation of the light. 254 is the most saturated (colored) and 0 is the least saturated (white).

block.description: The current state of the Light

model_id.description: The hardware model of the light.

name.description: A unique, editable name given to the light.

product_id.description: The Product ID of the Light

state.description: The current state of the Light

sw_version.description: An identifier for the software version running on the light.

unique_id.description: Unique id of the device. The MAC address of the device with a unique endpoint id in the form: AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF:00:11-XX
